name: Spring Kirin: Winter Overdue
description:
Waking up to unusually cold air, the seasonal guardian of spring, the Spring Kirin herself, goes into the forest to figure out who is responsible and to "convince them" to fix the balance of nature.

Battle and defeat feral enemies by managing your turn bar, item cool downs, and seasonal strengths carefully!

Playtime is roughly half an hour to an hour. Small game made within a week and a half. Working mechanical demo for a much larger game that may or may not be made, stay tuned.

Music may not loop perfectly and rooms may be invisible for a moment before loading properly. These won't be fixed unless I really, really feel like it, as my priorities are elsewhere.
